english.segment1: you're running through my mind again. i came across your words, "the end". it's only rightwe walk away. it's only right is what you say. it's all right, it's ok. we're better off this way. it's all right, it's ok. at least that's what you say. i'm falling of the world again. i cam across your words, "the end". i'm all uptight in losing you. you're moving on to somthing new
